description: Creates a theme to apply to the components in an Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app associated with the theme.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is a part of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique client token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: themeToCreate
parameters.description: Represents the configuration of the theme to create. The name of the theme. A list of key-value pairs that deï¬nes the properties of the theme. (dict) --- A key-value pair that defines a property of a theme. key (string) --- The name of the property. value (dict) --- The value of the property. value (string) --- The value of a theme property. children (list) --- A list of key-value pairs that define the theme's properties. overrides (list) --- Describes the properties that can be overriden to customize an instance of the theme. tags (dict) --- One or more key-value pairs to use when tagging the theme data. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: A list of key-value pairs that deï¬nes the properties of the theme.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of a theme property.

nested_params.name: children
nested_params.description: A list of key-value pairs that define the theme's properties.

nested_params.name: overrides
nested_params.description: Describes the properties that can be overriden to customize an instance of the theme.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of a theme property.

nested_params.name: children
nested_params.description: A list of key-value pairs that define the theme's properties.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: One or more key-value pairs to use when tagging the theme data.
